title: Initial D Battle Stage 2
title_jp: 頭文字〈イニシャル〉D BATTLE STAGE 2
synopsis:
This is simply the OVA summing up the major events and battles of "Initial D 4th Stage" much like the "Initial D Battle Stage" original summed up the first 3 seasons. Additionally, has 2 extra battles from the manga that were not incorporated into the original 4th Stage.

(Source: ANN)
